ComicInfo.Title: There Were Giants in Those Days (or, a Discourse between Heroes and Villains)
ComicInfo.Summary: There Were Giants in Those Days (or, a Discourse between Heroes and Villains): With Asgard still under a mystical sleep, the Frost Giants seek to awaken the Midgard Serpent to fight Thor. The dragon who shows up, however, is Fin Fang Foom but after a brief battle with our hero, its duplicity is revealed and Thor faces down Jormungand.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:31:05. [Issue ID 42870]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Loki,Balder the Brave,Jormungand (the Midgard Serpent, also disguised as Fin Fang Foom),Asgardian children [Hildy,Heimdall,Iceman,Kevin,the Enchantress,Iceman],Frost Giants,Thor [Sigurd Jarlsen],X-Factor [the Beast,Mick],Fandral,Sif,Kurse
